title: Quiet day for director dealings
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Oct 15, 2015, 04:12 BST - UK Markets open in 3 hrs 48 mins Quiet day for director dealings By Edward Swift | Sharecast – 11 hours ago 59.00 +2.50 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Activity on the director dealings front for Wednesday was particularly quiet. Source BioScience (LSE: SBS.L - news ) 's chairman Laurence Turnbull made a healthy profit by selling nearly half his stake in the company. 
He pocketed £0.34m by selling 2m shares and still holds 2,750,000 shares, approximately 0.79% of the company. 
Next Fifteen Communications (LSE: NFC.L - news ) ' Tim Dyson also took home a nice bonus, after receiving 150,000 shares from the company's long-term incentive plan. He promptly sold them for just over £0.29m. 
Top Director Buys Nanoco Group (LSE: NANO.L - news ) (NANO) Director name: Mr Anthony Clinch Amount purchased: 37,467 @ 57.38p Value: £21,499 Next Fifteen Communications (NFC) Director name: Mr Richard Eyre Amount purchased: 10,154 @ 195.00p Value: £19,800 Top Director Sells Source BioScience (SBS (LSE: 0JAZ.L - news ) ) Director name: Mr Laurie Turnbull Amount sold: 2,000,000 @ 17.00p Value: £340,000 Next Fifteen Communications (NFC) Director name: Mr Tim Dyson Amount sold: 150,000 @ 195.00p Value: £292,500
